msbt.message: I've always been real bad at figurin' out what clothes'd look good on my weird ol' bag of bones.Nobody's comfortable in their own body Least of all ME! So how'm I supposed to dress this carcass?I tell ya, it's a dadgum existential fashion crisis!
I'll take the lot! The whole store!<10_4 /> Just once in my life, I'd like to try doin' that, .
The only thing I know 'bout fashion is: you ain't supposed to copy what other folks are doingBut you gotta look just like 'em or you're not in style! It's enough to make a fella stop wearin' clothes!
Reckon I oughta start by trying on everything they got in the shop. It's free to try things on, right?
I bet if you went home wearin' somethin' you could only get on this islandyou could make folks back there more envious than cockroaches at a butterfly party!
Found anything good? It's fun to have souvenirs from a trip. Specially if it's something useful, like clothes.Or a nice, heavy rock.
So you heard we got our own tailors here now too? Thought I'd mosey on by and see if anythin' looks good Even good-lookin' clothes don't look good on me, but that'll keep me from spendin' Bells, .
Now that we got ourselves a fancy tailor shop here, this doesn't seem so much like a deserted island. Reckon I can get myself fitted into some fancy new duds and be the next big thing? Gahaha!
Now that the tailor shop opened up here, we can go shoppin' for clothes whenever we want, ! 'Course, I hate shoppin' for clothes
